data.name: Appointment.Validation.DateIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that a date is required for the appointment.

data.name: Appointment.Validation.DoctorNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified doctor cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Appointment.Validation.DurationIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that the duration of the appointment is required.

data.name: Appointment.Validation.PatientNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified patient cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Appointment.Validation.ReasonIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that a reason for the appointment is required.

data.name: Diagnosis.Validation.DiagnosisNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified diagnosis cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Diagnosis.Validation.NameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that a name for the diagnosis is required.

data.name: Diagnosis.Validation.NameLength
data.comment: Name cannot be more than 100 characters.

data.name: Doctor.Validation.AvailabilityIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that the doctor's availability is required.

data.name: Doctor.Validation.DoctorNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified doctor cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Doctor.Validation.FistNameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that the first name of the doctor is required.

data.name: Doctor.Validation.LastNameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that the last name of the doctor is required.

data.name: Doctor.Validation.SpecializationIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that the doctor's specialization is required.

data.name: Patient.Validation.AddressIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's address is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.BloodTypeIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's blood type is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.DateOfBirthIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's date of birth is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.EmailAddressIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's email address is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.FirstNameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's first name is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.LastNameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's last name is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.PhoneNumberIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering the patient's phone number is mandatory.

data.name: Patient.Validation.PatientNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified patient cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Role.Validation.DescriptionIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a description for the role is mandatory.

data.name: Role.Validation.NameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a name for the role is mandatory.

data.name: Role.Validation.RoleNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified role cannot be found in the system.

data.name: Symptom.Validation.NameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a name for the symptom is mandatory.

data.name: Symptom.Validation.SymptomNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified symptom cannot be found in the system.

data.name: User.Validation.PasswordIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a password is mandatory for the user.

data.name: User.Validation.UserNameIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a username is mandatory for the user.

data.name: User.Validation.UserNotFound
data.comment: Displayed when the specified user cannot be found in the system.

data.name: User.Validation.UserIdIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a user ID is mandatory.

data.name: User.Validation.RoleIdIsRequired
data.comment: Indicates that entering a role ID is mandatory for assigning roles to the user.
